title: Insulin and diabetes
description: Everyone with type 1 diabetes needs to take insulin as a medication. And so do some people with type 2 diabetes, some people with gestational diabetes and some people with other types of diabetes. Insulin helps you manage your blood sugar levels and helps prevents short-term or long-term serious health problems known as diabetes complications. What is insulin?
